body: Granted the comment below this one was 2 years ago so you'll never see this reply, but @anyone thinking the same thing, it literally doesn't even fucking matter cause she never shows up again in the sequel. Even the artist said post script there were just too many girls to focus on and little time so she was a one off. Her whole character didn't even matter lmao. Plus she became obsessed with the outside world anyway & she fucked a dude to get what she wanted. So she got a happy ending regardless
Why couldn't Ixia just stick to banging the MC. I mean they could of had a relationship too.
